text: <@U0HP6TFNX> i used this method but de-veganized it (butter and cheese). I used all water for the liquid. <http://foodsforlonglife.blogspot.com/2014/11/making-polenta-in-my-instant-pot.html>
tl;dr boil water/salt/butter in IP on saute, add polenta/stir, set to Manual for 7min and natural release. Stir.
